response.overview: An ex-cop turned con threatens to jump to his death from a Manhattan hotel rooftop. The NYPD dispatch a female police psychologist to talk him down. However, unbeknownst to the police on the scene, the suicide attempt is a cover for the biggest diamond heist ever pulled.
response.tagline: You can only push an innocent man so far
response.title: Man on a Ledge

results.name: Man on a Ledge (2011) Movie Trailer
